snippet: A decision to uphold the cancellation of six trademarks held by the team was a win for Native American groups that urged it to scrap its name.
abstract: Federal Judge Gerald Bruce Lee upholds repeal of Washington Redskins trademarks, win for Native American groups that have urged team to scrap name many find bigoted and offensive; Redskins plan to appeal ruling.
lead_paragraph: A decision to uphold the cancellation of six trademarks held by the team was a win for Native American groups that urged it to scrap its name.

headline.main: Redskins Lose Round in Battle Over Name
headline.print_headline: Repeal of Redskins’ Trademarks Is Upheld
